short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension notifies you with the latest programming contests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension notifies you with the latest programming contests from codeforces, hackerrank and codechef.
It will be a good tool for any developer to improve his programming skills as he won't miss any contest again.
